UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_GT_Update
UseTemplate.UPDATE_CODE: (A:AIRSPEED TRUE CALIBRATE, degrees) #CLAMP_VALUE# (>A:AIRSPEED TRUE CALIBRATE, degrees)

Parameters.FLAG_LOCALIZER_CODE: (A:GPS IS ACTIVE FLIGHT PLAN:#ID#, Bool) (A:NAV HAS NAV:#ID#, Bool) #GPS_DRIVES_NAV_SIMVAR# ?

Case.SELECTION: (A:FUEL TANK #TANK_ID_2# QUANTITY, Gallons) #MAX_FUEL_DISPLAYED_QUANTITY_GALLONS# / (A:FUEL TANK #TANK_ID_1# QUANTITY, Gallons) #MAX_FUEL_DISPLAYED_QUANTITY_GALLONS# /

Parameters.SELECTION: (A:ELECTRICAL MAIN BUS VOLTAGE:1, volt) (A:ELECTRICAL MAIN BUS VOLTAGE:1, volt) (A:ELECTRICAL MAIN BUS VOLTAGE:1, volt) (A:ELECTRICAL MAIN BUS VOLTAGE:1, volt) (A:ELECTRICAL MAIN BUS VOLTAGE:1, volt) (A:ELECTRICAL MAIN BUS VOLTAGE:1, volt)

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_GT_Anim_Code
UseTemplate.ANIM_CODE: #SELECTION# #BUS_COUNT# #BUS_ID_SELECTED# case sp0 l0 #MIN_VOLTAGE_DISPLAYED# max #MAX_VOLTAGE_DISPLAYED# min #MIN_VOLTAGE_DISPLAYED# - #VOLTAGE_RANGE_DISPLAYED# / sp0 l0 100 *

True.FAILURE: (A:CIRCUIT GENERAL PANEL ON, Bool) (A:GENERAL ENG MASTER ALTERNATOR:#ID#, Bool) * (A:TURB ENG CORRECTED N1:#ID#, Percent) 10 > *

False.FAILURE: (A:CIRCUIT GENERAL PANEL ON, Bool) (A:GENERAL ENG MASTER ALTERNATOR:#ID#, Bool) * (A:GENERAL ENG RPM:#ID#, Percent) 100 > *
